title: Vawiin Pathianni a lo thleng
lyrics:
Vawiin Pathianni a lo thleng,
Amah fak turin kan inkhawm;
Zinga thovin amah kan bia,
Hlim takin lawm nachang kan hria.

Kan sual fo hi thupha kan chawi,
Keinin thu sual kan awih fo thin;
A mi khawngaihzia ngaihtuahin,
Min zuah vangin mak kan ti thin.

Ni ruk chhungin hna kan thawk thei,
Chawlhni amah biak nan a ni;
Amahin thatin min vur zel,
Chutih vangin Chawlhni a rel.

Ka thinlungin thu mai maite,
Van lam thu lo chu ngai suh se;
Pathian thianghlim, a ropui nen,
Ngaihtuah rawh se, a pawm tlak hle.

Isua anga thil tha tiin,
Amah anga thu sawi theih nan,
Thlarau Thianghlim, Lalpa, kan ngen,
Van chawlhnaa min hruai tur nen.
